title: OXO PerfectPull Flushable Wipes Dispenser
description: The OXO Good Grips Flushable Wipes Dispenser is the perfect way to keep flushable wipes fresh, accessible and discreet. The silicone gasket in the lid keeps wipes fresh and keeps them from drying out. The lid opens with a simple, one-handed push, and the internal weighted plate dispenses wipes one at a time. The non-slip feet keep the Wipes Dispenser in place, and its compact size allows it to fit neatly on the back of the toilet. The clear indicator window on the front of the Wipes Dispenser shows how many wipes are left, so you’ll know when it’s time for a refill. The polished construction is easy to clean, and the Dispenser fits up to 60 flushable wipes.

transcripts: At OXO we look for inspiration everywhere and sometimes that includes looking at our own products. This next item was inspired by or baby wipes dispenser. The OXO perfect pull flushable wipes dispenser is a great way to keep flushable wipes fresh, accessible and discreet. The lid opens with a single one handed push and the silicone gasket in the lid keeps wipes fresh and keeps them from drying out. The internal weighted plate allows you to dispense wipes one of the time. The non-slip feet keep the wipes dispenser in place and it's compact size allows you to fit neatly on the back of the toilet. The clear indicator window on the front of the dispenser shows just how many wipes are left so you'll know when it's time for a refill. The polish construction is easy to clean and the dispenser fits up to 60 flushable wipes. Here's a good tip the flushable wipes dispenser can also be used for face cleansing wipes and flushable big kid wipes.
